   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Overview
========
Welcome to Trycarbonara, the carbon data platform that gives software engineers and IT teams a seamless way to manage and reduce the carbon footprint of their operations. Think of us not just as an API, but as your complete toolkit, helping you make a difference in the fight against climate change within the ICT industry.

Addressing the carbon footprint of the Information and Communications Technology (ICT) industry – responsible for 1.5-2% of global greenhouse gas emissions [1]_, [2]_, [3]_ – can seem like a daunting task. But with our platform, you have the tools to understand and significantly reduce your carbon emissions, contributing to the decrease of this significant percentage.

Whether you're working on bare-metal systems, in the cloud, or leveraging Kubernetes, Trycarbonara has tailored solutions for your specific needs. Our platform supports Nvidia GPUs and offers comprehensive carbon emissions data across a wide range of system configurations.

Join us in this mission to make a tangible difference for our climate, optimize costs, and showcase your commitment to sustainability.

Citations
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. [1] `Spiceworks <https://www.spiceworks.com/it-trends/sustainability-initiatives-it-industry-2022>`_
.. [2] `BCG <https://www.bcg.com/en-us/publications/2019/role-ict-sustainable-development-triple-green-win>`_
.. [3] `UPI <https://www.upi.com/Top_News/World-News/2020/09/23/Global-computings-carbon-footprint-is-bigger-than-previously-thought/3961600880183/>`_
